item.title: Poco X7 5G, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Set For January 9: From Camera To Display, What We Know So Far - ABP Live
item.description:
Poco X7 5G, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Set For January 9: From Camera To Display, What We Know So Far

Publication Date: January 1, 2024
Source: ABP Live

Poco is set to launch its new X7 5G smartphone series in India, featuring both the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G on January 9. The phones will be available exclusively on Flipkart, and Poco is actively promoting their design and features on social media.

Don't just meet expectations; Smash them üòà #POCOX7 Series launching on 9th Jan | 5:30 PM IST on #Flipkart

  • Design: The standard X7 will have a centrally placed camera module, while the Pro will have a pill-shaped array.
  • Camera: Expected 50MP primary cameras and a 20MP selfie camera for the X7.
  • Performance: X7 Pro will likely feature the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra, while the base variant may use the Dimensity 7300-Ultra.
  • Battery: Pro model might include a 6,000mAh battery with 90W fast charging; standard model expected to have a 5,110mAh battery with 45W charging.
  • Display: The series will feature 6.67-inch AMOLED screens, with high refresh rates and robust protection.

Overall, the upcoming Poco X7 series appears to be a significant addition to the smartphone market, promising impressive features and specifications that cater to modern user needs.

item.title: Putin's Gaming Ambition Falls Flat: Russian 'Homegrown' Consoles Can't Compete With PS5, Xbox - NDTV
item.description:
Putin's Gaming Ambition Falls Flat: Russian 'Homegrown' Consoles Can't Compete With PS5, Xbox

Date: October 2023
Source: Techspot

A little less than a year after Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his government to develop gaming consoles, officials have admitted their devices cannot compete with established brands like PlayStation and Xbox. Despite these challenges, the goal remains to promote domestic video game products.

Key Points:

  • Russian gaming consoles are underpowered compared to PS5 and Xbox.
  • One console uses Russia's Elbrus processor, noted for its lack of competitive performance.
  • Deputy Chairman Anton Gorelkin emphasizes the need for innovation in domestic consoles.
  • Social media reactions vary from surprise to humor regarding Russia's gaming competition.
  • Putin's directive for consoles comes after major companies stopped sales to Russia due to geopolitical issues.

Notable Quotes:

"Elbrus processors are not yet at the stage of development to ensure equal competition with the PS5 and Xbox." - Anton Gorelkin
"I do remember hearing Russia saying they were going to make their own console. I didn't actually expect them to follow through." - Social media user

Conclusion:

The effort to create competitive gaming consoles in Russia faces significant technological hurdles and public skepticism, reflecting broader challenges in the region's tech industry.

item.title: 5 iPhones coming in 2025 and what to expect - India Today
item.description:
5 iPhones Coming in 2025: What to Expect

Publication Date: N/A Source: India Today

The article discusses the upcoming iPhones scheduled for release in 2025, highlighting their expected features and launch timelines.

  • The iPhone SE 4, possibly rebranded as iPhone 16e, is set to launch in March 2025.
  • The new SE model aims to be Apple's most affordable iPhone featuring AI technologies.
  • The iPhone 17 is expected in September 2025, revolutionizing the design with a new camera bump style.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is anticipated to be the thinnest iPhone yet, with specifications akin to the base iPhone 17.
  • The iPhone 17 Pro will maintain a 6.3-inch display but may feature design alterations.
  • iPhone 17 Pro Max will offer enhanced features, including better battery life due to its size.
"The 17 Pro Max will be getting a smaller Dynamic Island than every other model."

Overall, the article provides insight into Apple's future mobile offerings, showcasing innovative design upgrades and affordability efforts.

item.title: HMD Key With 6.52-Inch Screen, 4,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
HMD Key Launched: Affordable Phone with Impressive Specs

Publication Date: Thursday, Source: Gadgets 360

The HMD Key was launched in select global markets, offering budget-friendly features paired with modern technology including a 4G connection and a robust battery.

  • The HMD Key is priced at GBP 59 (about Rs. 6,300).
  • It features a 6.52-inch display with a resolution of 576 x 1,280 pixels.
  • Powered by a Unisoc 9832E chipset, it comes with 2GB of RAM and 32GB of storage.
  • Equipped with an 8MP rear camera and a 5MP front camera.
  • Battery capacity is 4,000mAh with 10W charging support.
‚ÄúUsers will receive two years of quarterly security updates.‚Äù

The launch of the HMD Key emphasizes the company's focus on affordable yet capable smartphones for everyday consumers.

item.title: Samsung India Announces ‚ÄòBig TV Days‚Äô; Elevate the Future of Cinematic Experience with Exciting Offers on AI-Powered Premium TV Range - Samsung Newsroom India
item.description:
Samsung India Launches ‚ÄòBig TV Days‚Äô with Exciting Offers on Premium TVs

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Samsung News

Samsung India has announced its ‚ÄòBig TV Days‚Äô campaign, offering substantial cashback and other benefits on its premium television models from January 3 to January 31, 2025, to elevate home entertainment experiences across India.

  • Exciting offers include up to 20% cashback, zero down payment, and EMI options up to 30 months.
  • Consumers can avail free Samsung TVs worth up to ‚Çπ204,990 and free soundbars worth up to ‚Çπ99,990 with select purchases.
  • The campaign is designed to celebrate the New Year and Republic Day season.
  • Samsung emphasizes the use of AI technology in its premium TVs to enhance viewing experiences.
  • The ‚ÄòBig TV Days‚Äô includes the Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, and 4K UHD TV models.
‚ÄúAt Samsung, we are redefining home entertainment with our ‚ÄòBig TV Days‚Äô campaign, offering unmatched deals on our premium AI-powered TVs,‚Äù said Viplesh Dang, Senior Director, Visual Display Business, Samsung India.

The campaign aims to make advanced AI technology more accessible and elevate the cinematic viewing experience for customers.

item.title: CES 2025: Samsung unveils OLED monitors for gaming, content creation, more - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung Unveils Innovative OLED Monitors Ahead of CES 2025

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 • Source: News Agency

Samsung has introduced its latest monitor lineup, featuring cutting-edge OLED technology designed for gamers and content creators at the CES 2025 in Las Vegas.

  • New entries include the Odyssey Series, Smart Monitor M9, and ViewFinity series.
  • The Odyssey OLED G8 features a 27-inch 4K display with a 240Hz refresh rate.
  • The Odyssey OLED G6 boasts the world's first OLED panel with a 500Hz refresh rate.
  • The Odyssey 3D offers a 3D experience without glasses using a lenticular lens.
  • The Smart Monitor M9 integrates on-device AI for picture optimization.
  • The ViewFinity S8 is designed for productivity with a 37-inch 4K display.
‚ÄúThe Odyssey OLED G8 offers more detailed and lifelike visuals, enhancing the experience for both gamers and creators.‚Äù

In conclusion, Samsung's new OLED monitors are designed to enhance visual experiences for both gaming and content creation, pushing the boundaries of display technology.

item.title: From startup founders to athletes: How India‚Äôs angel investor landscape is evolving beyond wealthy individuals | Mint - Mint
item.description:
From startup founders to athletes: How India‚Äôs angel investor landscape is evolving beyond wealthy individuals

Publication Date: [Insert Date] Source: Mint

As traditional big-name founders in India‚Äôs startup ecosystem reduce their investments, a new class of angel investors, including athletes and young professionals, are emerging in the angel investment landscape.

  • The top three angel investors of 2023 have pulled back from funding in 2024.
  • Athletes are increasingly participating in early-stage funding.
  • This shift reflects a broader trend in the investment landscape in India.
"Sport stars, actors and young professionals are edging their way into angel investment territory"

This evolution in the angel investment landscape highlights changing dynamics in funding sources for startups in India.

item.title: OnePlus 13 cases leak hints at MagSafe like features and fresh materials - India Today
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Cases Leak Hints at MagSafe-like Features and Fresh Materials

Published On: Jan 3, 2025 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The upcoming OnePlus 13 series is set to launch globally on January 7, 2025, showcasing fresh accessories that feature magnetic capabilities, akin to Apple's MagSafe technology, and are compatible with Qi2 wireless charging.

  • OnePlus 13 will launch globally after initial release in China.
  • The series includes magnetic cases that can attach easily and work with various magnetic accessories.
  • Materials used for the cases will be Sandstone, Aramid Fiber, and Wood Grain, familiar to OnePlus fans.
  • These cases will offer compatibility with Qi2 chargers for an efficient charging experience.
  • The introduction of magnetic features represents a shift in the Android accessory market to catch up with Apple's innovations.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs interesting to see how the Android world is catching up with Apple‚Äôs MagSafe.‚Äù

This new development from OnePlus reflects a growing trend in advanced smartphone accessories, enhancing user convenience and compatibility across devices.

item.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra Launch Timeline Revealed: Will It Come To India? - News18
item.description:
Xiaomi 15 Ultra Launch Timeline Revealed: Will It Come To India?

Date: January 03, 2025

Source: News18

Xiaomi is expected to launch the 15 Ultra model in 2025, following the successful introduction of the 14 Ultra model in the Indian market. There have been hints from company president Lu Weibing regarding its release at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in March.

  • The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is likely to be unveiled on March 2, 2025, at MWC in Barcelona.
  • It will feature the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a variety of premium specifications.
  • Previous models set a precedent, with the Xiaomi 14 Ultra launching at MWC 2024.
‚ÄúThe Xiaomi 15 Ultra would be unveiled at MWC 2025,‚Äù - Lu Weibing

The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is anticipated to have features such as 90W wired charging, satellite communication capabilities, and impressive camera specifications, including a 200MP large-aperture periscope telephoto sensor.

In conclusion, the Xiaomi 15 Ultra is generating significant anticipation for its potential launch in India, building on the success of previous models and the global market's demand for innovative smartphone features.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Launch Date, Price, Design, Specs, Latest Leaks: What To Expect Fr - Times Now
item.description:
What to Expect from the iPhone 17 Series: Design, Specs, and Launch Details

Updated on: Jan 3, 2025, Source: Times Now News

Apple is gearing up to unveil its latest iPhone lineup, which includes the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and the all-new iPhone 17 Air, promising significant design changes and advanced features.

  • The iPhone 17 series will feature models with design upgrades and new A19 series chips.
  • There will be significant design improvements across all models, with Pro versions made from a combination of aluminium and glass.
  • Expect a horizontal camera configuration on the standard model and a central camera for the Air model.
  • All models may include ProMotion technology for smoother displays with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The Pro Max is expected to boast a triple-camera setup featuring three 48MP lenses.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is predicted to be Apple's thinnest phone at just 6.25 mm thick.
  • The expected launch date is September 2025 during Apple's fall event.
  • Pricing in India might start at Rs 1,19,900 for Pro models, while the standard model continues at Rs 79,900.
"The iPhone 17 Air is expected to bridge the gap between the standard and Pro models, appealing to users seeking portability without compromising performance."

This upcoming iPhone series is set to bring notable advancements and design changes that may reshape consumer expectations for smartphones.

item.title: OnePlus Watch 3 Series Could Go Pro, Come With New Health Features - News18
item.description:
OnePlus Watch 3 Series Could Go Pro, Come With New Health Features

Date: January 03, 2025
Source: News18

With the launch of OnePlus 13 approaching, buzz surrounds the OnePlus Watch 3, possibly featuring advanced health functionalities as indicated by recent app updates.

  • The OnePlus Watch 3 may come with an electrocardiogram (ECG) function.
  • The device could be branded as the Watch 3 Pro, enhancing its appeal.
  • Key features may include disease identification for heart-related conditions.
  • A Wrist Temperature feature allows monitoring after baseline settings.
  • The new Checkup feature will assess multiple health indicators.
‚ÄúIt may identify many diseases, including high or low heart rates, frequent PVCs and AFib.‚Äù

The anticipated specifications include a Snapdragon W5 Gen 1 SoC, 2GB RAM, and a battery capacity around 631-648mAh. Potentially, it will launch alongside OnePlus 13 in international markets.

item.title: Samsung Brings ‚ÄòEclipsa Audio,‚Äô 3D Technology Developed With Google, to 2025 TVs and Soundbars - WebWire
item.description:
Samsung Brings ‚ÄòEclipsa Audio,‚Äô 3D Technology Developed With Google, to 2025 TVs and Soundbars

Publication Date: Thursday, January 2, 2025 | Source: WEBWIRE

Samsung Electronics is set to revolutionize home entertainment by integrating Eclipsa Audio, a 3D audio technology developed with Google, into its 2025 lineup of TVs and soundbars.

  • Eclipsa Audio enables creators to craft dynamic and immersive audio experiences for users.
  • Samsung leads the industry by adopting this innovative technology across its full range of 2025 TVs‚Äîfrom Crystal UHD to Neo QLED 8K.
  • Content creators will be able to upload Eclipsa Audio tracks to YouTube for enhanced audio experiences.
  • The collaboration with the Telecommunications Technology Association (TTA) aims to ensure high audio fidelity through a certification program.
  • Taeyong Son from Samsung stated this innovation shapes the future of home entertainment.
‚ÄúWe believe that Eclipsa Audio has the potential to change the way we experience sound,‚Äù - Jim Bankoski, Google Chrome.

The integration of Eclipsa Audio by Samsung represents a significant advancement in the audio-visual space, further enhancing consumer experience in home entertainment.

item.title: Samsung Brings ‚ÄòEclipsa Audio,‚Äô 3D Technology Developed With Google, to 2025 TVs and Soundbars - Samsung Global Newsroom
item.description:
Samsung Brings ‚ÄòEclipsa Audio,‚Äô 3D Technology Developed With Google, to 2025 TVs and Soundbars

Publication Date: [Insert Date]   |   Source: [Insert Source]

Samsung Electronics is set to revolutionize home entertainment by integrating Eclipsa Audio‚Äîa 3D audio technology developed with Google‚Äîinto its 2025 TVs and soundbars, offering immersive audio experiences.

  • Eclipsa Audio will be available across Samsung‚Äôs 2025 TV lineup, including Crystal UHD and Neo QLED 8K models.
  • The technology enhances audio by allowing creators to manipulate sound location and intensity.
  • Content creators will be able to upload videos with Eclipsa Audio to YouTube starting in 2025.
  • Samsung and Google are collaborating on a certification program to ensure audio quality.
‚ÄúWe are proud to lead the industry with the integration of Eclipsa Audio into our 2025 TV and soundbar lineup.‚Äù - Taeyong Son, Samsung Electronics

This advance highlights Samsung's commitment to enhancing home entertainment and providing consumers with diverse options to experience cutting-edge audio technology.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Likely To Happen In March This Year: Know More - News18
item.description:

Date: January 02, 2025 | Source: News18

The start of 2025 has brought exciting news about the next Nintendo Switch console, which may be announced in March.

  • A new report suggests that the Nintendo Switch 2 could be released on March 28, 2025.
  • The timeline aligns with Nintendo's plan to unveil the Switch replacement within its current fiscal year.

Source: GSM Arena

The Realme 14 Pro+ features advanced camera technology, including a unique periscope lens with impressive zoom capabilities.

item.title: Apple MacBook Air 2025 Models Likely To Launch Before iPhone SE 4: 5 Key Features To Expect - Times Now
item.description:
Apple MacBook Air 2025 Models Likely To Launch Before iPhone SE 4: 5 Key Features To Expect

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times Now

Apple is set to launch updated MacBook Air models soon, featuring the new M4 chip with improved performance and battery life.

  • The new MacBook Air models will feature the powerful M4 chip with a 10-core CPU and GPU.
  • Base models will come with 16GB of RAM, double the previous standard.
  • They will include a 12MP Center Stage camera for enhanced video calls.
  • Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, supporting up to two external displays.
  • Nano-texture display option may be available to reduce glare.
‚ÄúThe chip is 25 percent faster than the M3 and promises better power efficiency.‚Äù

In summary, the new models anticipate performance upgrades and better functionality, although major design changes are unlikely.
